backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing uploaded videos, tracking processing status, camera mode, and saving analysis results using map-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of frontend files describing functionality, styling, and optimizations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page title and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring theme provider, React Query, header/footer, and routing between capture and analysis views.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisView.tsx: Video analysis UI with playback controls, mock real‑time decisions, trajectory data generation, and cleanup of analysis intervals.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with anime‑styled visuals and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Animated header with MR.AI UMPIRE branding and system‑aware theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/UploadSection.ts: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/VerdictCard.tsx: Renders a styled card displaying a verdict’s text, confidence, and reasoning with color-coded visuals.
frontend/src/components/VideoCapture.tsx: Provides camera and upload video capture functionality with recording, mode switching, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/VisualizationPan: Shows a real-time SVG visualization of ball trajectory based on frame data and current playback time.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and managing login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for uploading videos, polling status, retrieving results, and updating camera mode via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes and anime-style cricket colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom color tokens mapped to CSS variables, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, features, issues, and pending requests for the MR.AI UMPIRE app.
